name: Azim Noori
story: Khairullah Noori was born and raised in a small village in Afghanistan. He grew up surrounded by war and conflict, and this has shaped who he is today. Despite only being young, Khairullah has already been involved in many dangerous and daring missions as a recon team leader for OPFOR. He is known for his fearlessness, his quick thinking, and his loyalty to his team. While he is proud of his heritage and values his faith, Khairullah is always looking for ways to improve himself and his skills on the battlefield.
